Package net.tnemc.plugincore.core.connections.economy

Interface EconomyConnector

public interface EconomyConnector
Created by creatorfromhell. The New Plugin Core Minecraft Server Plugin All rights reserved. Some Details about what is acceptable use of this software: This project accepts user contributions. Direct redistribution of this software is not allowed without written permission. However, compiling this project into your software to utilize it as a library is acceptable as long as it's not used for commercial purposes. Commercial usage is allowed if a commercial usage license is bought and verification of the purchase is able to be provided by both parties. By contributing to this software you agree that your rights to your contribution are handed over to the owner of the project.

  • Method Details

    • createAccount

      boolean createAccount(String identifier, String world)
      Used to create an economy account
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier of the account. This could be a username or a UUID valid String.
      world - The world to create the account for.
      Returns:
      True if the account was created.

    • deleteAccount

      boolean deleteAccount(String identifier, String world)
      Used to delete an economy account
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier of the account. This could be a username or a UUID valid String.
      world - The world to delete the account from.
      Returns:
      True if the account was deleted.

    • getCurrency

      String getCurrency()
      Returns:
      The global default currency.

    • getCurrency

      String getCurrency(String world)
      Parameters:
      world - The world to use for the search.
      Returns:
      The default currency for the world.

    • hasCurrency

      boolean hasCurrency(String currency)
      Used to check if the specified currency exists.
      Parameters:
      currency - The name of the currency to look for.
      Returns:
      True if the currency exists, otherwise false.

    • hasCurrency

      boolean hasCurrency(String currency, String world)
      Used to check if the specified currency exists in the specific world.
      Parameters:
      currency - The name of the currency to look for.
      world - The name of the world to use in the search
      Returns:
      True if the currency exists, otherwise false.

    • getHoldings

      BigDecimal getHoldings(String identifier, String world)

      BigDecimal getHoldings(String identifier, String world, String currency)
